text:
e="preserve">Joel Barcellos (November 27, 1936 – November 10, 2018) was a Brazilian actor. He appeared in 53 movies and television shows between 1955 and 1997. He starred in the 1974 movie ', which was entered into the 24th Berlin International Film Festival. He was born in Espírito Santo, Brazil.
Barcellos died on November 10, 2018 in Rio das Ostras, Brazil from a stroke, aged 81.
